participant_1.name: Mike
participant_1.personality: supportive and enthusiastic, enjoys spending time with his family, and has a good sense of humor.
participant_1.background: i coach little league baseball. i've five sons. coffee is my preferred beverage. i drive a mini van. i also like a glass of wine in the evenings.

participant_2.name: Lisa
participant_2.personality: energetic and playful, loves music and dancing, and has a nostalgic side.
participant_2.background: i love new kids on the block. i also like old school hip hop. i was born in the early 80 s. i take dance lessons once a week. my favorite toy as a child was my lite brite.

content.text: Hey! Do you have five sons? Because I do.
I am a fan of basketball
I just got back from the water.
Just a little of a little
I like to play sports with my kids
